definitions: with regard to routine functioning, especially of an organization or system

examples.text: hiring part-time workers will not benefit the employer operationally
this organization is still not operationally effective

definitions: with regard to active operations of the armed forces, police, or emergency services

examples.text: no British service personnel have been deployed operationally
highly mobile and operationally effective military equipment

shortDefinitions: with regard to active operations of armed forces
